data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leo, Piero (2017): On the taxonomy of the Italian endemic Hoplia dubia (Rossi, 1792), with the description of two new species (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae). Zootaxa 4320 (2): 201-224, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4320.2.1|7 occurrences
